long_description: Truly revolutionary  truly LEAD-FREE.  They are environmentally friendly products that also happen to be much better lures  they are weighted with oversized Big Belly Stainless Steel bodies to cast far and run deep. Being made with stainless steel parts insures that these lures will last pretty much forever.  They are more durable than all other spinners and far more resistant to salt water, rusting & corrosion.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
